attr.title: Mini Monsters Gravity Consensus
attr.desc: Mini Monsters Gravity Consensus is a charming 2D puzzle game with a unique gravity control mechanic. Perfect for a relaxing evening, it offers simple yet engaging puzzles that progressively challenge you as you unlock new levels and gameplay mechanics, making each step forward more exciting and fun.
attr.inst:
Download the game form steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205470/Mini_Monsters_Gravitational_Consensus/
and COPY the 'MiniMonsters.pck' file into the root of the portfolder.
